overview:
Fx Multitech Private Limited

We are one of the leading organizations promoted by two engineering graduates and established in business since 1994 having vast industrial / global marketing experience in industrial machinery and industrial machinery components.

Every product dealt by Fx Multitech stands for quality & durability. The product range we are offering includes Aluminum Slugs and Collapsible Tubes for Export and Danfoss and Frascold Italy Compressors, and Condensing units, Roller Germany Evaporator units for Cold Room, Foris Index Italy Cold Room Doors, Gomax Italy capillary for Refrigeration line and pressure connections.

Set up in Ahmedabad, our firm is promoted by two young but highly experienced persons, Mr. Subhash Agarwal & Mr. Selvaraj R. They have to their credit vast experience in international sourcing & marketing through e-commerce, which has proved to be very beneficial for the successful running of our firm.

Phone: +(91)-(79)-27910993/27910994/27910995
